name: Mexican Phone Numbers
description:
Regex for Mexican phone formats
"+52 xx xxxx xxxx" -- Country code +  2 digit area code + 8 digits (Mexico City, Monterrey, & Guadalajara only)
"+52 xxx xxx xxxx" -- Country code +  3 digit area code + 7 digits (rest of Mexico)
content:
Mexican phone formats
"+52 xx xxxx xxxx" -- Country code +  2 digit area code + 8 digits (Mexico City, Monterrey, & Guadalajara only)
"+52 xxx xxx xxxx" -- Country code +  3 digit area code + 7 digits (rest of Mexico)

+011 52 06 8651 3842 (North America to Mexico)
+52 55 1083 7700 (Mexico City, Monterrey, & Guadalajara)
+52 954 582 0170 (Elsewhere in Mexico)

Example: +011 52 06 7651 3842 (dials to a landline in Mexico City, Mexico, from the United States)
Example: +52 1 55 3355 2233 (dials to a cell phone in Mexico City, Mexico, from within Mexico)
Example: +52 457 333 4423 (dials to a landline in Valparaiso, Mexico, from within Mexico)
Example: +52 1 457 333 4423 (dials to a cell phone in Valparaiso, Mexico, from within Mexico)
author: Jake Dunn
